divs: Sighting DetailsOn my way to the store to buy soda, I noticed an unusually bright star by the moon. As I walked I kept looking at it because it was not usually there. Then about 10 minutes later I saw it blink. Then it started to fly away in a straight line. It made no noise. About a minute later it flew out of sight above a pet store. It could not have been an airplane because it was silent and was stationary for almost 13 minutes. I cannot explain what it was.
trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Springfield
There were no other sightings in Springfield on or around November 16th 2007
